survey_name: Impact of Workplace Design on Employee Creativity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how workplace design elements influence employee creativity and innovation. The insights will help organizations optimize their office environments to foster creativity.

questions.question_text: How often do you feel creative in your current workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure frequency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How often do you feel creative in your current workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following design elements in your workspace contribute most to your creativity? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.

script.question_text: Which of the following design elements in your workspace contribute most to your creativity? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Describe one workspace design change that would significantly boost your creativity.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Describe one workspace design change that would significantly boost your creativity.

questions.question_text: How does the availability of flexible workspaces (e.g., hot desks, lounge areas) impact your creative output?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure impact. Ensure question clarity.

script.question_text: How does the availability of flexible workspaces (e.g., hot desks, lounge areas) impact your creative output?

questions.question_text: What percentage of your workday do you spend in spaces specifically designed for creative thinking?
questions.client_notes: Use predefined ranges for easier analysis. Ensure the question is straightforward.

script.question_text: What percentage of your workday do you spend in spaces specifically designed for creative thinking?
